rules_text:
As an additional cost to cast Behel, sacrifice an equipment.
Deathtouch
Treat Behel as though it’s equipped with each equipment in your graveyard.
notes:

OG_3: Was 4 mana

OG_2:
Was a rare

OG_1:
Costed 1UB, and was a legendary equipment.
Whenever equipped creature attacks, exile an artifact card from your graveyard.
Equipped creature has all abilities of artifact creatures exiled with _1 Junkdrinker.
_1 Junkdrinker has all abilities of non-legendary equipment exiled with it.
Equip—Discard a card.
